subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[lean on]]; to [[recline]]
# to [[depend]] on; to [[rely on]]
# to [[trust]]; to have [[confidence]] in
# to [[come]] [[near]] to; to [[approach]]
# to [[keep]] to (a certain side)
# {{lb|zh|euphemistic}} {{zh-alt-form|肏|to [[fuck]]}}
